attributes.action: Provide on call psychiatrists to attend the homes of suicidal patients instead of g.ps referring them to Accident and Emergency departments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Dear Miss Walker,

We do not normally accept petitions which contain very personal details about individual cases, as the epetitions site is a very public forum and this petition would be available on this site or in an archived version of the site for the foreseeable future.

We would therefore ask you to consider whether you want such personal details to be included in your petition, or if you would prefer to reword it to talk about this issue in a more general way.
reasons: Material which is potentially confidential, commercially sensitive, or which may cause personal distress or loss
